Class MDIDesktopManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.swing.DefaultDesktopManager
        |
        +--unbbayes.fronteira.MDIDesktopManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.DesktopManager, java.io.Serializable
class MDIDesktopManager
extends javax.swing.DefaultDesktopManager

Private class used to replace the standard DesktopManager for JDesktopPane. Used to provide scrollbar functionality.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

endResizingFrame

public void endResizingFrame(javax.swing.JComponent f)
This method signals the end of the resize session. Any state maintained by the DesktopManager can be removed here. Normally f will be a JInternalFrame.
Overrides:
endResizingFrame in class javax.swing.DefaultDesktopManager
Parameters:
f - normally a JInternalFrame

endDraggingFrame

public void endDraggingFrame(javax.swing.JComponent f)
This method signals the end of the dragging session. Any state maintained by the DesktopManager can be removed here. Normally f will be a JInternalFrame.
Overrides:
endDraggingFrame in class javax.swing.DefaultDesktopManager
Parameters:
f - normally a JInternalFrame
